title: Week 12 preview
itunes:title: Week 12 preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – go game-by-game previewing each post-Thanksgiving game in Week 12 – including an exciting matchup between the Seahawks and Steelers, and an AFC Wildcard battle as the Chiefs and Bills fight for a playoff spot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
